game_description: Get set for an epic thrill ride with "Loony Legends" â€“ the mind-blowing Virtual Reality sensation brought to you by the awesome two person team at Mirarami! It's the ultimate blend of brainpower, lightning-fast reflexes, and jaw-dropping hand-eye coordination that'll keep both kids and adults on the edge of their seats. Prepare to be blown away by the dazzling and funky visuals of "Loony Legends." Immerse yourself in stunning environments that are bursting with vibrant colors and wacky animations. Each level is a feast for the eyes, which will leave you grinning from ear to ear. But hey, time is ticking! With a countdown timer ticking you've got to bring your A-game as you race against the clock. Sharpen those reflexes and push yourself to the limits and aim for total domination and the elusive perfect score. Can you handle the pressure and become the ultimate legend? Only you can answer that question. So what are you waiting for? Download Loony Legends today!
review_1: Real cute game. The pictures are cool, quirky and fun to match. I enjoyed just zoning out for a little while trying to beat the clock. Something different.
